Class ScoreAMaticTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.strikes.ScoreAMaticTest

  • class ScoreAMaticTest
extends java.lang.Object
    This method exercises the ScoreAMatic class to ensure that the correct final score is calculated for various test cases.
